name: Bug Jar
description:
A game about collecting bugs, to fix the game's bugs.
Made for the Wowie! Jam 2, this game was created by me, GreaterPangolin and Tanisha. There are few levels right now, since our focus has been the game feel for the jam. Have a look, We hope you enjoy our little prototype!

Controls

<------------------------------------->

LEFT ARROW -> Move left
RIGHT ARROW -> Move Right
SPACE -> Possibly Jump
X -> Capture a bug
C -> Release a bug
ESCAPE -> Quit Game

Made for the Wowie Jam 2.0!

Who thought capturing bugs would be so much fun!

Collect insect cards in order to introduce or remove bugs from the game!

Post Jam Updates:

Added a 5th level
Added a tutorial in levels
Added falling snow
Added a reset button
Fixed Bugs (And Jars)
